data.message:
Facebook I need help quick
A picture of mine was reported but facebook said it didn't violate any standards 
So they put my picture back on but I'm.still on feature block!!!

replies.message: Hey Horton. Blocks are temporary and can last a few hours or a few days. Please sit tight while the ban is in place. For more information, visit: http://bit.ly/2fSligC. -Joe

Actually, mine is 30 days
If it were only a couple days, I'd be fine with it but I didn't do anything wrong and I have to go a whole month without doing anything
Can you please please help Facebook!!

Facebook: I'm from Norway and FB has blocked me in 30 days 2 times, yes, It was 2 times I got blocked of FB, short time after the first time in 30 days and now I still have 16 days on my other profile side!! It's NOT fair when I got 2 times and I've seen other people wrote worse than me and they goes free!!! I wrote about the difference between Halalslaughter and common Norwegian slaughterhouse! I was anyway blocked by FB and because I wanted to defend the animals?! Then yesterday FB across the border and injustice, I think!
And what's the point of complaining about wrong reporting when users are not heard or did not answer them back? We do not get response even! Why does FB hates just me or animals? And that I was feel about FB and I'm so mad on FB too!!!

Email:Pasword:Home:Friend:Message:Search .notification Menu: all is damage facebook  shut down https://.facebook.com/home.php?ref_component=mfreebasic_home_header&ref_page=%2Fwap%2Fpages_timeline.php&refid=17
turn it off and remove the batery and turn it back and restart  you have now a news feed ang after an hour  useless  maybe all is damage facebook  app the device it has a virusing mobile.
